member.name: IDWriteFontDownloadListener.DownloadCompleted
member.summary:
The DownloadCompleted method is called back on an arbitrary thread when a
download operation ends.
member.param:
Pointer to the download queue interface on which
the BeginDownload method was called.

Optional context object that was passed to BeginDownload.
AddRef is called on the context object by BeginDownload and Release is called
after the DownloadCompleted method returns.

member.name: IDWriteFontDownloadListener
member.summary: Application-defined callback interface that receives notifications from the font download queue (interface). Callbacks will occur on the downloading thread, and objects must be prepared to handle calls on their methods from other threads at any time.
